transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Chandra oil se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Sir, Numan baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Good afternoon. Boliye sir.
Customer: Sir, aapne 9696 IndiaMART se call kiya tha?
Executive: Ji sir, bilkul.
Customer: Ji ji, bataiye sir kya issue aa raha hai aapko? Pehle to mere ko ye bataiye sir ki aapki IndiaMART se jo bhi hamare jo bande hote hain aapke, un type ke. Haan ji.
Customer: Wo plan lene ke liye jab hum hum bolte hain ki mera abhi MDC plan chal raha hai. Thik hai na?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: To mere ko MDC plan liye hue ek mahina hi hua tha aur maine kaha sir mere ko isse upgrade wala dena hai abhi. Thik hai na?
Executive: Hmm. Haan ji.
Customer: To sir unhone sab kuch sir, waise main Gujarat se bol raha hun lekin maine business kiya Delhi mein jaake. Okay? Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Okay, sunte rahiye meri baat abhi. Haan ji haan ji. Fir bola ki aapka ₹1,18,000 mein teen EMI mein matlab ki teen kisto mein aapko paisa dena padega. Maine kaha koi baat nahi main teen kisto mein kar lunga paisa. Maine ek hi mahine mein do kist ka kaam kar liya. Maine do do do kisto mein paisa de diya abhi ek kist baki hai paiso ki. Thik hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Unhone bola tha ki aapko hum 50 lead alag se denge. Thik hai. Non-listable. Thik hai? Plus aapka jo cashback hota hai us cashback ke badle main aapko WhatsApp service wala SMS service wala wo aapko provide karaunga. Thik hai.
Executive: Ye baatein inhone mere ko phone pe boli aur jaise hi mera maximizer ka plan done hua, wagera hua fir sir unhone wo nat gaye. Wo bolte nahi nahi humne aisa thodi to unko bola tha humne to wo to nahi bola tha. Aisa hota tha maine kaha sir maine business aapke main Gujarat mein baith ke Delhi mein kiya to aapko aap fir unhone ka bolne ka tarika dekho sir. Kya bolte hain? To aisa hota to Gujarat mein le lete na yahan pe kya karna hai. Lo sir had hai sir.
Executive: To nahi aapko abhi matlab bola gaya hai ki aapko 50 non-listable lead degi aur WhatsApp integration degi.
Customer: Wo to dene ke liye tayar ho gaye. 50 non-listable lead dene ke liye lead dene ke liye tayar ho gaye. Haan. Ab mera cashback ka jo paisa tha na wo cashback unhone convert karke unhone bola tha ki aapko hum WhatsApp service dila denge SMS ki. Thik hai. Wo us pe unhone sir mana bol diya ki nahi aapko us pe ₹6-7000 aur dalne padenge.
Executive: Okay. Cashback service dene ke liye mana kar rahe hain matlab?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Unhone ₹1,18,000 mein ye sab baatein boli hai. Ab ab jab ye deal puri hui to uske baad mein ab inko yaad aaya ₹6000 ke nahi ab to ₹6000 lagenge. To aap mere ko pehle bol dete to main plan nahi leta na. To fir main Gujarat mein baith ke Delhi mein kyun business karne diya isse IndiaMART wale to Ahmedabad mein hi hote hain main Ahmedabad wale se hi kaam le leta. Nahi nahi nahi aap befiker rahiye agar aisa kuch nahi. Unke bolne ka unke bolne ka tarika kya hai aapko malum hai? Wo bole aisa hota to kya Gujarat mein le lete na Delhi kyun le rahe ho? Aap achcha kisse baat hui thi aapki?
Customer: Mera ek Tiwari karke hai, ek din chalu hui hai. Naam agar main pura bata du aapko. Naam hai Sona Swapnil Tiwari. Swapnil Tiwari ji. Haan ji haan ji. Inhi se inhi ne commit kiya tha aapko?
Executive: Ab main unse pehle unhone se best ek banda hai Negi sir. Negi sir ne maine Negi sir se baat maine Negi sir mujhe IndiaMART ka plan lena hai. To kaha haan bhai hum karwa denge. Negi sir bahut hi achche insan hain unhone mere ko achche se tackle kiya. Fir MDC plan. Nahi nahi abhi ye jo maximizer ki services pe abhi to hum log ko jo issue aa raha hai wo isi service pe aa raha hai na?
Customer: Haan, bilkul. To to abhi pehle aapki Raksha se baat hui hogi. Raksha ke manager jo hain wo. Sir ji ko to kuch aata nahi unhone to mere ko WhatsApp pe bhi block kar diya. Maine kaha madam aapke do commitment hai usko mere ko done karke dijiye na aap. Kyun aap back foot pe ja rahe ho aap?
Executive: Thik hai abhi aapne jo sir bataya hai main idhar pe note down kar leta hun aapki complaint. Aur aap befiker rahiye ki agar aapke aapke paas sir kuch matlab proof kaise diya tha unhone? What conversation hui thi ya proof to diya hota na to main immediately aapko send kar leta. Actually main iPhone use karta hun na to iPhone mein recording system nahi rehta hai. First of all to. Unhone bakayda mere ko aisa bola ₹1,18000. WhatsApp call kiya tha? Hai sir? Nahi. Aapko WhatsApp call. Achcha normal call tha. Lekin sir hai na unhone sir main actually mein mujhe koi sapna to aaya nahi tha na WhatsApp ka ya SMS service ka aisa to mujhe to malum nahi hai. Unhone khud ne samne se bola ki sir aap kyun tension le rahe ho main aapko offer deta hun aapko ₹1,18000 mein 50 non-listable lead plus sir aapko main WhatsApp service bhi dunga. Aapki extra ho jayegi lead to directly aapko WhatsApp pe mil jayegi wagera wagera bahut mere ko bola na to maine kaha chalo mere ko do fayde mil rahe to kyun na le hum. Thik hai na? Thik hai main aapko aapka idhar pe jo concern hai ye raise kar deta hun. Aur main ek bar discuss kar leta hun sir befiker rahiye agar jo aapke sath best hoga wo hum aapko solution provide karenge. Thik hai sir? Aur abhi to bilkul mana hi bol rahe hain ki nahi aisa humne bola hi nahi wo nahi bola nahi aap galat fehmi mein ho unhone aisa bola nahi. Nahi nahi nahi. Ye befiker rahiye sir aapki aapki voice hamare liye priority hai aur aap agar bola nahi hota to aapko pata hi nahi hota ki IndiaMART mein cashback naam ki bhi koi cheez hai. Exactly. Exactly right. To befiker rahiye. Befiker rahiye main is pe jo bhi hota hai main baat karke aapko update karunga. Nahi sir mujhe karwa karwa ke lena hai aapko. Thik hai na? Nahi sir dekhiye jo bhi best hoga aapke solution mein main usko provide karke dunga main aapse abhi kuch commit nahi karunga. Main ek bar apni team se baat karta hun. Usse wo kya solution nikalta hun aapko jo bhi hoga best hi hoga aapke liye. Ye befiker rahiye bas. Okay. Chalo. Thik hai sir. Okay ji. Thank you. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was promised 50 non-listable leads.

- Promised WhatsApp and SMS services.

- Executive is denying the cashback offer.

- Customer is unhappy with executive's behavior.



Resolution:

- Executive noted down the customer's complaint.

- Assured to provide a solution after discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the issue internally.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, cashback, leads, whatsapp, sms
